card.name: Batsutora's Father
card.text: ■ Whenever a creature attacks you, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Machinegun Talk
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may choose a creature and untap it. ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Tutanmekhanen
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each player draws a card. ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Poktamatama
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may shuffle all cards in your opponent's graveyard and put them on the bottom of their owner's deck.

card.name: Papparapali Nights
card.text: ■ Mana Drive 2 (Jokers): When you put this creature, if you have 2 or more cards in your mana zone and one or more of them is jokers, put a jokers from your graveyard into your mana zone. ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: God Gayondam
card.text: ■ Mana Drive 4 (Jokers): When you put this creature, if you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone and one or more of them is jokers, you may discard a jokers. If you do, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Sensuikanchan
card.text: ■ This creature can't be attacked. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may jokers tornado. If you do, use one of the jokers tornadoed creature's Ability that starts with "When you put this creature into the battle zone"

card.name: Orechinrenji
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put one on the bottom of your deck. ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Jay-SHOCKER
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may jokers tornado. If you do, until the start of your next turn, your opponent can't put a card that costs the same as that jokers tornadoed creature into the battle zone. Jokers Tornado Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Bainarashutter
card.text: ■ Mana Drive 6 (Jokers): When you put this creature, if you have 6 or more cards in your mana zone and one or more of them is jokers, choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs 7 or less and put it on the bottom of their deck. ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Almighty Zennou
card.text: ■ Your opponent's creatures can't attack on the turn they are put into the battle zone. ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Dandarda Big Bang, Infinite Gattai
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, jokers tornado up to 2 times. If you do, you may choose a spell from your hand or graveyard that costs the same as or less than the total cost of the Jokers returned to your hand and cast it for no cost. After you cast that spell, put it on the bottom of your deck instead. Jokers Tornado
